## admiral view host

view existing host by substring of hostname or IP or view all records when no argument passed

### Synopsis

view existing host by substring of hostname or IP or view all records when no argument passed

```
admiral view host [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for host
  -j, --json   view in json format (present vars)
```
